column5: Hi All For those that are going to Lakair ,the long range weather report is a High of 19-22 from Thursday on and a low of 8-10 with No rain all weekend, so pack accordingly, so glad that I am in cotage *8, See everyone on Thursday
Well, they were wrong about the weather here most of last week so who knows....on the bright side we won't have to worry about seeing GCD topless  Maureen
I was worried with all this dry weather there might be a fire ban on.  Does anyone know if there is?  Camping requires a campfire  Joey
I predict it will get dark at night, clearing by morning.
I don't think there's a ban right now Joey, I'm pretty sure it rained there yesterday or today, and it's supposed to rain a bit there tomorrow so all should be well.  Maureen
Checked out the weather for NOrth Bay and they are now calling for 70% chance of rain on Saturday.  The forecast will change a hundred times til then though...LOL.

Good the weather will be cool so I expect to see lots of fish pics from all Lakair attendees and you can't use the its too hot excuse.Now go catch some fish  And Roy if you bring your boat try and go fishing Bud you can socialise in the boat.  MTP
